body.p: In response to these comments, the Board deleted the reference to ‘significant voting power’ because it was undefined, used inconsistently and created unnecessary complexity. The Board concluded that if the effect of ‘significant voting power’ was considered to be the same as ‘significant influence’, its deletion would have no effect because ‘significant influence’ is in the definition. On the other hand, if the effect of ‘significant voting power’ was considered to be different from that of ‘significant influence’, IAS 24 did not explain what that difference was.
